learning_objectives.objective: Recall the definition of the Gmail API and list its key resources (e.g., Message, Thread, Label, Draft).
Explain how the Gmail API can be leveraged in phishing attacks and the role of Google Workspace alerts like MailPhishing in detection.
Identify phishing indicators in sample Gmail API usage logs during ethical penetration testing.
Compare and contrast legitimate versus malicious uses of Gmail API resources in a simulated scenario.
Assess the security risks of Gmail API integrations in an organizational email system and recommend defensive measures.
Design an ethical penetration testing plan that incorporates Gmail API reconnaissance, detection strategies, and remediation for phishing simulations.
